一.notes: MOE Level 1 (frequently used); basic numeral, high-frequency in all contexts

人.notes: MOE Level 1; core social character, foundational for compounds (e.g., 人民)

二.notes: MOE Level 1; basic numeral, simple stroke structure for education

十.notes: MOE Level 1; numeral, used in directionals (e.g., 十字路)

百.notes: MOE Level 1; numeral, common in idioms (e.g., 百折不挠)

千.notes: MOE Level 1; numeral, daily use (e.g., 千万, 千米)

万.notes: MOE Level 1; core for large quantities, traditional 萬

上.meaning: up; above; on; go up; superior; shang (music tone)
上.notes: MOE Level 1; directional, polyphonic (shàng daily, shǎng music)

下.meaning: down; below; under; go down; inferior; next
下.notes: MOE Level 1; directional, paired with 上 (e.g., 上下)

大.meaning: big; large; great; adult; major; doctor (dài); Tai (surname)

小.notes: MOE Level 1; core descriptor, paired with 大 (e.g., 小孩)

天.notes: MOE Level 1; cultural significance (e.g., 天道, 天下)

地.meaning: earth; land; ground; place; structural particle (de)
地.notes: MOE Level 1; polyphonic (dì noun, de particle), paired with 天

水.notes: MOE Level 1; basic element, daily use (e.g., 水果, 水平)

火.notes: MOE Level 1; basic element, daily use (e.g., 火车, 火锅)

山.notes: MOE Level 1; nature character, place names (e.g., 山东)

木.notes: MOE Level 1; basic element, plant/construction words (e.g., 木头)

日.notes: MOE Level 1; time/nature character (e.g., 日子, 日常)

月.notes: MOE Level 1; time character, paired with 日 (日月)

口.meaning: mouth; opening; speech; classifier for people/animals
口.notes: MOE Level 1; basic radical, speech words (e.g., 口语)

手.notes: MOE Level 1; body part, action words (e.g., 手机, 手工)

心.notes: MOE Level 1; emotion character, psychology words (e.g., 心情)

目.notes: MOE Level 1; body part, vision words (e.g., 目的, 目光)

耳.notes: MOE Level 1; body part, hearing words (e.g., 耳朵, 耳机)

足.meaning: foot; leg; sufficient; satisfy; walk (zuó, archaic)
足.notes: MOE Level 1; body part, movement words (e.g., 足球)

头.notes: MOE Level 1; traditional 頭, polyphonic (tóu noun, tou suffix)

面.meaning: face; surface; side; noodles; aspect; plane
面.notes: MOE Level 1; dual meaning (face/noodles), traditional 麵 for food

道.meaning: way; path; tao; method; say; classifier for roads/rivers
道.notes: MOE Level 1; Taoist term, philosophy/transport (e.g., 道理)

德.notes: MOE Level 1; cultural/ethical term (e.g., 道德, 品德)

学.notes: MOE Level 1; education core (e.g., 学习, 学校), traditional 學

习.notes: MOE Level 1; paired with 学 (学习), traditional 習

工.meaning: work; labor; craft; engineer; industrial; together (gòng, archaic)
工.notes: MOE Level 1; work/industry words (e.g., 工人, 工厂)

作.meaning: do; make; work; write; composition; workshop (zuō)
作.notes: MOE Level 1; polyphonic (zuò daily, zuō 作坊), confused with 做

业.meaning: career; profession; industry; business; study; achievement
业.notes: MOE Level 1; career/education (e.g., 事业, 毕业), traditional 業

家.meaning: home; family; household; expert; suffix (jie, e.g., 姑娘家)
家.notes: MOE Level 1; family core (e.g., 家庭), polyphonic

国.notes: MOE Level 1; political/geographic (e.g., 国家, 中国), traditional 國

中.meaning: middle; center; in; among; China; hit (zhòng); be elected (zhòng)
中.notes: MOE Level 1; directional/cultural core (e.g., 中间, 中文), polyphonic

华.meaning: China; Chinese; magnificent; flower (huā); Hua (surname, huà)
华.notes: MOE Level 1; cultural term (e.g., 中华, 华人), traditional 華

和.meaning: peace; harmony; and; with; moderate; sing in harmony (hè); knead (huó); mix (huò); win (hú, mahjong)
和.notes: MOE Level 1; cultural core (e.g., 和平), highly polyphonic

平.meaning: flat; level; peaceful; calm; average; equal
平.notes: MOE Level 1; paired with 和 (和平), daily use (e.g., 平时)

安.meaning: safe; peaceful; secure; settle; calm; install
安.notes: MOE Level 1; safety core (e.g., 安全, 安心)

乐.meaning: happy; joy; music; enjoy; want (yào, archaic); Lao (surname, lào)
乐.notes: MOE Level 1; traditional 樂, polyphonic (lè joy, yuè music)

福.meaning: blessing; fortune; happiness; luck; blessing from God
福.notes: MOE Level 1; cultural festival term (e.g., 福气, 祝福)

寿.meaning: longevity; birthday; life span; celebrate birthday
寿.notes: MOE Level 1; longevity term (e.g., 长寿, 寿礼), traditional 壽

喜.notes: MOE Level 1; emotion core (e.g., 喜欢, 喜事), festivals

好.meaning: good; well; nice; like; friendly; hobby (hào); be fond of (hào)
好.notes: MOE Level 1; high-frequency descriptor (e.g., 好人), polyphonic

美.meaning: beautiful; pretty; handsome; good; US (abbrev.); beauty
美.notes: MOE Level 1; descriptor (e.g., 美丽, 美好), cultural (e.g., 美德)

爱.meaning: love; affection; like; care for; cherish
爱.notes: MOE Level 1; emotion core (e.g., 爱情, 爱心), traditional 愛

友.notes: MOE Level 1; social core (e.g., 朋友, 友好)

情.meaning: feeling; emotion; affection; love; situation; circumstance
情.notes: MOE Level 1; emotion words (e.g., 情感, 情况), radical 忄

理.meaning: reason; logic; truth; manage; handle; tidy
理.notes: MOE Level 1; rational/management (e.g., 道理, 理解)

想.meaning: think; consider; miss; want; idea; suppose
想.notes: MOE Level 1; thought verb (e.g., 想法, 想念), radical 心

说.meaning: say; speak; talk; tell; explain; persuade (shuì); pleased (yuè, archaic)
说.notes: MOE Level 1; speech verb (e.g., 说话), traditional 說

看.meaning: look; see; watch; read; consider; guard (kān); watch over (kān)
看.notes: MOE Level 1; multi-meaning verb (e.g., 看书), polyphonic

听.meaning: listen; hear; obey; accept; listen to
听.notes: MOE Level 1; hearing verb (e.g., 听音乐), traditional 聽

读.meaning: read; study; pronounce; peruse; read aloud (dòu)
读.notes: MOE Level 1; education verb (e.g., 读书), traditional 讀

写.meaning: write; compose; describe; copy; write down
写.notes: MOE Level 1; writing verb (e.g., 写字), traditional 寫

画.meaning: draw; paint; picture; painting; stroke (in character); draw a line
画.notes: MOE Level 1; art/strokes (e.g., 画画), traditional 畫

书.notes: MOE Level 1; education/literature (e.g., 书本, 书法), traditional 書

数.meaning: number; count; calculate; several; fate; repeatedly (shuò)
数.notes: MOE Level 1; numeral/verb (e.g., 数字, 数数), traditional 數

字.meaning: character; word; letter; name; write; character stroke
字.notes: MOE Level 1; language core (e.g., 汉字, 字体)

文.meaning: text; writing; culture; language; civil; literary
文.notes: MOE Level 1; cultural core (e.g., 文化, 文字), paired with 武

章.meaning: chapter; section; rule; badge; seal; article
章.notes: MOE Level 1; literature/seal (e.g., 文章, 印章)

印.meaning: seal; stamp; print; impress; mark; engrave
印.notes: MOE Level 1; seal-carving core (e.g., 印章, 打印), official use

刻.meaning: carve; engrave; moment; engraving; harsh; strict
刻.notes: MOE Level 1; seal-carving (e.g., 篆刻, 刻章), time (e.g., 立刻)

艺.notes: MOE Level 1; art/seal (e.g., 艺术, 技艺), traditional 藝

术.meaning: art; skill; technique; method; surgery; ripe (shú, archaic); bamboo (zhú, archaic)
术.notes: MOE Level 1; art/technique (e.g., 技术, 篆刻术), traditional 術

父.notes: MOE Level 1; family core (e.g., 父亲, 父母), polyphonic

母.notes: MOE Level 1; family core (e.g., 母亲, 母爱)

儿.meaning: son; child; young; suffix (er); plural marker
儿.notes: MOE Level 1; family/suffix (e.g., 儿子, 花儿), traditional 兒

女.meaning: woman; female; girl; daughter; you (rǔ, archaic)
女.notes: MOE Level 1; gender core (e.g., 女人, 女儿), radical for female words

子.meaning: son; child; seed; fruit; suffix (zi); ancient honorific
子.notes: MOE Level 1; family/suffix (e.g., 儿子, 桌子)

夫.meaning: husband; man; worker; scholar; he (fú, archaic); alas (fú, interjection)
夫.notes: MOE Level 1; family/social (e.g., 丈夫, 夫人), polyphonic

妻.notes: MOE Level 1; family core (e.g., 妻子, 夫妻), polyphonic

老.meaning: old; aged; senior; veteran; prefix for respect (e.g., 老师)
老.notes: MOE Level 1; age descriptor (e.g., 老人, 老师), kinship prefix

少.meaning: few; little; less; young; teenager (shào); junior (shào)
少.notes: MOE Level 1; quantity/age (e.g., 多少, 少年), polyphonic

多.meaning: many; much; more; a lot of; multiple
多.notes: MOE Level 1; quantity core (e.g., 多少, 多个), paired with 少

长.meaning: long; length; forever; grow; elder; leader (zhǎng); senior (zhǎng)
长.notes: MOE Level 1; length/growth (e.g., 长短, 长大), traditional 長

短.notes: MOE Level 1; length descriptor (e.g., 长短, 短信), paired with 长

前.notes: MOE Level 1; directional (e.g., 前面, 前天), paired with 后

后.notes: MOE Level 1; directional (e.g., 后面, 后来), traditional 後

左.notes: MOE Level 1; directional (e.g., 左边, 左手), paired with 右

右.meaning: right; right side; rightist; west (ancient); help
右.notes: MOE Level 1; directional (e.g., 右边, 右手), paired with 左

西.notes: MOE Level 1; directional (e.g., 西方, 东西), paired with 东

南.meaning: south; southern; Nan (surname); Buddhist chant (nā, archaic)
南.notes: MOE Level 1; directional (e.g., 南方, 南北), paired with 北

北.notes: MOE Level 1; directional (e.g., 北方, 南北), paired with 南

里.meaning: mile; kilometer (archaic); inside; within; village; suffix (li)

间.notes: MOE Level 1; space/action (e.g., 中间, 分开), traditional 閒

时.notes: MOE Level 1; time core (e.g., 时间, 时候), traditional 時

分.notes: MOE Level 1; time/quantity (e.g., 分钟, 分数), polyphonic

钟.notes: MOE Level 1; time/object (e.g., 钟表, 钟声), traditional 鐘

正.meaning: correct; right; positive; upright; Zheng (surname); first month (zhēng)

我.notes: MOE Level 1 (frequently used); core first-person pronoun in modern Chinese; high-frequency in daily communication, writing, and education (e.g., 我是中国人, 我的书)

你.notes: MOE Level 1; core second-person pronoun (e.g., 你好, 你的笔)

她.notes: MOE Level 1; third-person pronoun (feminine), e.g., 她是老师

它.notes: MOE Level 1; third-person pronoun (inanimate), e.g., 它是猫 (wrong: use 牠 for animals), 它是桌子

们.meaning: plural marker for pronouns (e.g., 我们, 你们)
们.notes: MOE Level 1; suffix (no standalone use), traditional 們

这.notes: MOE Level 1; demonstrative pronoun (e.g., 这个, 这里), traditional 這

那.notes: MOE Level 1; demonstrative pronoun (e.g., 那个, 那里), polyphonic

哪.notes: MOE Level 1; interrogative pronoun (e.g., 哪里, 哪个), polyphonic

谁.notes: MOE Level 1; interrogative pronoun (e.g., 谁来了, 谁的书)

什么.notes: MOE Level 1; interrogative (e.g., 你在做什么), traditional 甚麼

怎么.notes: MOE Level 1; interrogative (e.g., 怎么了, 怎么做), traditional 怎麼

为什么.notes: MOE Level 1; interrogative (e.g., 你为什么哭), traditional 為什麼

哪里.meaning: where; nowhere; polite denial (e.g., 哪里哪里)

这里.notes: MOE Level 1; locative (e.g., 我在这里), traditional 這裡
